trans-unit.source: Learn how to troubleshoot RemoteApp cloud collection creation failures
trans-unit.target: Learn how to troubleshoot RemoteApp cloud collection creation failures

trans-unit.source: Common errors seen in the Azure Management portal:
trans-unit.target: Common errors seen in the Azure Management portal:

trans-unit.source: Cloud collections often fail during creation because of you are using custom images.
trans-unit.target: Cloud collections often fail during creation because of you are using custom images.

trans-unit.source: If you see one of the above errors and you are using a custom image to create the collection, please check the following things:
trans-unit.target: If you see one of the above errors and you are using a custom image to create the collection, please check the following things:

trans-unit.source: Ensure that the custom image you uploaded meets image requirements.
trans-unit.target: Ensure that the custom image you uploaded meets image requirements.

trans-unit.source: Most often the common problem is that the image was not properly syspreped.
trans-unit.target: Most often the common problem is that the image was not properly syspreped.

trans-unit.source: Verify the image can boot within Hyper-V or try creating an IAAS VM directly in your Azure subscription using the image.
trans-unit.target: Verify the image can boot within Hyper-V or try creating an IAAS VM directly in your Azure subscription using the image.

trans-unit.source: If the VM fails to boot and not start, then this usually indicates that the custom image was not prepared correctly.
trans-unit.target: If the VM fails to boot and not start, then this usually indicates that the custom image was not prepared correctly.

trans-unit.source: Verify the custom image was built following the How to create a custom template image for RemoteApp
trans-unit.target: Verify the custom image was built following the How to create a custom template image for RemoteApp

trans-unit.source: If you are using one of the Microsoft images included with your subscription, try to create the collection again.
trans-unit.target: If you are using one of the Microsoft images included with your subscription, try to create the collection again.

trans-unit.source: If the issue persists then please contact Microsoft support.
trans-unit.target: If the issue persists then please contact Microsoft support.

trans-unit.source: If you see this error this usually means that you been upgraded to a paid account but you are trying to use a Microsoft provided image that is valid only during the trial mode of the service.
trans-unit.target: If you see this error this usually means that you been upgraded to a paid account but you are trying to use a Microsoft provided image that is valid only during the trial mode of the service.

trans-unit.source: In this case, try to create your cloud collection again, but be sure to specify the correct image.
trans-unit.target: In this case, try to create your cloud collection again, but be sure to specify the correct image.
